name: Labyrinth of Submission
description:
Labyrinth of Submission

Created for TOJAM: What Twelves below by Team Shruggles.
Theme: Prepare for Disappointment

Julian Gosiengfiao (Twitter): Design
Robby Duguay (Twitter): Audio
Kyle Dwyer (Twitter): Programming
Hubert Bibrowski (Twitter): Title Art, Moral Support

Labyrinth of Submission is a Rogue-Similar that forces the player to take on negative traits as they progress. The player needs to be selective when deciding how to progress in order to properly prepare for the disappointment of levelling up. The game features a static map, but spawns unique enemies and items on subsequent playthroughs.

Controlled exclusively with the mouse. Mouse over items and enemies to gain a better understanding of the world around you. Click to move and attack.
